message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand its worth to you is significantly higher than what I'm asking.  I'm willing to sell it for $1400000. This price reflects the fair market value and ensures a mutually beneficial transaction.  I'm confident this deal will be advantageous for both of us.  Please let me know your decision.
